f-div.title: f-div
f-div.description: F-div is used as a container for HTML elements, atom, molecules, etc.

variant.description: Variants are various representations of a f-div.

state.description: Fill property defines the background color of a f-div.

secondary.description: For layers above the default surface

tertiary.description: For layers above the default surface

danger.description: Distructive actions and negative consequences. Eg: Delete, Remove, Destroy

warning.description: To indicate discouragement. Not always distructive.

border.description: Border property enables a border for f-div.  You can combine border properties to achieve a desired result.

border-width.description: Thickness of the borders, otherwise know as weight or size.

subtle.description: Subtle, usually used as separators in a stack.

border-position.description: Border can display top, bottom, left, right, and around

bottom.description: Border shows only on the bottom of the element.

top.description: Border shows only om the top of the element.

left.description: Border shows only om the left of the element.

right.description: Border shows only on the right of the element.

gap.description: Gap defines the space between the items of a layout.

auto.description: Items are evenly distributed to fill the space.

padding.description: Padding defines extra between the elements and the container. Gap is used for spacing between elements. You specify different values for each side. Top Right Bottom Left = Small Medium Small None.

width.description: Width of the element. Refer to the Figma handover document to know which property to use.

fill-container.description: Will up 100% of the parent container (default).

hug-content.description: Will take the width of the elements inside.

num-value.description: You can specify a value in pixels.

height.description: Height of the element. Refer to the Figma handover document to know which property to use.

fill-container.description: Will up 100% of the parent container.

hug-content.description: Will take the width of the elements inside.

num-value.description: You can specify a value in pixels.

overflow.description: Define f-div behvaviour when elements inside overflow its width or height.

wrap.description: Height of f-div will automatically increase to allow elements to wrap (default).

scroll.description: A scroll bar will appear when elements overflow the width or height.

hidden.description: Hide elements that overflow the width of height.

align.description: Define where the elements inside f-div align.

middle-left.description: Align f-div to left and vertically center elements.

middle-center.description: Align f-div to center and vertically center elements.

middle-right.description: Align f-div to right and vertically center elements.

top-left.description: Align f-div to top-left and elements to the top.

top-center.description: Align f-div to top-center and elements to the top.

top-right.description: Align f-div to top-right and elements to the top.

bottom-left.description: Align f-div to bottom-left and elements to the bottom.

bottom-center.description: Align f-div to bottom-center and elements to the bottom.

bottom-right.description: Align f-div to bottom-right and elements to the bottom.

selected.description: Sets the f-div to a selected state. Select between border, background, or notch based on your usecase

background.description: Changes the background to reflect a selected state.

border.description: Adds a subtle border around the entire f-div.

notch-right.description: Adds a notch on the top right of the f-div. The notch has maximum height of 48px

notch-left.description: Adds a notch on the top left of the f-div. The notch has maximum height of 48px

loading.description: Displays a loading state. Shimmer replaces the content.

clickable.description: Gives the element hover and clicked properties.

tooltip.description: Displays a simple tooltip on hover. Only string
